meanings.definition: Showing signs of senility or eccentricity.
meanings.sent1: The old man's behavior became dottier as he started talking to imaginary friends.
meanings.sent2: Her grandmother's stories get dottier every time she tells them.
meanings.sent3: It was dottier than usual when the cat started meowing back at the TV.
meanings.sent4: The town's rumors grew dottier with each passing day.
meanings.sent5: The painting looked even dottier under the dim light of the gallery.

meanings.sent1: The new puppy was even dottier than the one before, always chasing its tail.
meanings.sent2: As the night grew darker, the stars appeared dottier in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The cake decoration looked dottier than expected, with colorful swirls and dots.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting became dottier as she rushed to finish the letter.
meanings.sent5: The music notes on the page seemed to dance in a dottier pattern.
